description: Liveness endpoints must not check dependencies; readiness endpoints must check all critical dependencies. (Updated for demo)
diff: Update: Liveness endpoints (e.g., /health/liveness) must only check if the app process is running. Readiness endpoints (e.g., /health/readiness) must check all critical dependencies and only return healthy if all are available. Docker/Kubernetes configs must use the correct endpoint for each probe. [Demo update]
